name: Repair Rivals
description:
This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Repair Rivals is a 2-4 player game where two teams compete to see who can rebuild their ship first.

After crashing on an unknown planet, players must explore the environment to find the missing parts for their ship and bring them back to build up their ship. The first team to complete their ship is the winner!

Players can dash into other players to knock them down for a period of time, use this to your advantage if you see someone taking a piece you need.

Team sizes are not forced, so 3v1s are possible. We are not liable for any ruined friendships resulting from dash-attack mains.
